mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mobility_level (level, distance, is_diagonal, is_avoiding_torpedoes, avoiding_roll, avoiding_less) VALUES (#{level}, #{distance}, #{isDiagonal}, #{isAvoidingTorpedoes}, #{avoidingRoll}, #{avoidingLess})
mapper.select: SELECT id, level, distance, is_diagonal, is_avoiding_torpedoes, avoiding_roll, avoiding_less FROM mobility_level ORDER BY level ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE mobility_level SET level = #{level}, distance = #{distance}, is_diagonal = #{isDiagonal}, is_avoiding_torpedoes = #{isAvoidingTorpedoes}, avoiding_roll = #{avoidingRoll}, avoiding_less = #{avoidingLess} WHERE id = #{id}
